    Finalize Service Connection
    Press the PS3 button on the controller
  • Just Now
    Connect with Bluetooth
    Press the PS3 button on the controller
  • Today - 15:35
    Disconnect Mini-USB Cable
    Disconnect the mini USB cable
  • Today - 15:35
    Run Setup Commands
    This step is run automatically
  • Yesterday - 10:41
    Connect Mini-USB Cable
    Connect the controller to the Pi with the mini-USB cable. You might need to quickly disconnect the cable and reconnect if this step takes more than 5 seconds to process
